VoiceDir7.8CA44: This is a true life-or-death issue. Said straight with horror.
Line7.8CA44: My pipe! I left my pipe back in the chapel! We must go back and get it!
Line11.8CA44: Bah! Fine, but I won’t forget this betrayal, Deckard, you know I won’t!

Line9.6D03F: Old man, if you turn your back now, I’ll be the first to bury a blade in it!
Line1.8CA44: Oh… oh, no! No! Back! We need to go back!
